00082 #define Ltahoe_new_int_reg() L_new_register_operand (++(L_fn->max_reg_id), \
00083                                                L_CTYPE_LLONG, 0)
00084 
00085 #define Ltahoe_new_pred_reg(ptype) L_new_register_operand (++(L_fn-> \
00086                                                max_reg_id), \
00087                                                L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, (ptype))
00088 
00089 #define Ltahoe_copy_or_new(cop,opd) (cop) = ((opd) == NULL) ? \
00090                                             Ltahoe_new_int_reg() : \
00091                                             L_copy_operand ((opd))
00092 
00093 #define Ltahoe_true_pred(ptype) L_new_macro_operand (TAHOE_MAC_PRED_TRUE, \
00094                                                      L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, \
00095                                                      (ptype))

00100                                               L_CTYPE_LLONG, 0)
00101 #define Ltahoe_PMAC(mac) L_new_macro_operand (TAHOE_MAC_ ## mac, \
00102                                               L_CTYPE_PREDICATE, 0)
00103 #define Ltahoe_FMAC(mac) L_new_macro_operand (TAHOE_MAC_ ## mac, \
00104                                               L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, 0)

00106                                               L_CTYPE_DOUBLE, 0)
00107 #define Ltahoe_BMAC(mac) L_new_macro_operand (TAHOE_MAC_ ## mac, \
